notes: Generated from snapshot_mab_input (1)_results.xlsx after training run. Factors adjust physics predictions to match measured data. Use ml_model flags to switch to trained models.
notes_moisture: Observed moisture ~18% higher than predicted (typical due to residual bound water not captured in dÂ²-law).
notes_rh: Predicted RH slightly high (overestimates humidity buildup); multiply by 0.92 for better match.
notes_outlet_temp: Predicted outlet temp ~3% high (underestimates evaporative cooling); multiply by 0.97.
notes_d50: Predicted D50 ~12% low (underestimates agglomeration); multiply by 1.12.
notes_morphology: Use trained morphology_model.pkl (RandomForestClassifier with balanced class weights). Threshold for dimpled spheres: Pe_integrated > 3.0 and Pi_ratio > 1.2.
notes_moisture_model: Use trained moisture_model.pkl (RandomForestRegressor). Features include T1_C, feed_g_min, solids_frac, effective_pe_drug, integrated_pe.
notes_outlet_temp_model: Use trained outlet_temp_model.pkl (GradientBoostingRegressor). Features include T1_C, feed_g_min, m1_m3ph, water_loading_g_m3.
notes_d50_model: Use trained d50_model.pkl (RandomForestRegressor). Features include atom_pressure, feed_g_min, viscosity_moni, solids_frac.
notes_rh_outlet_model: Use trained rh_outlet_model.pkl (GradientBoostingRegressor). Features include T1_C, RH1, T_outlet_C, evap_water_kgph.
